verses.verse: <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> <S%H6215>and,<s%> behold, Esau was <S%H935>coming,<s%> and with him <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%> He <S%H2673>divided<s%> the <S%H3206>children<s%> between <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8198>handmaids.<s%>

He <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H8198>handmaids<s%> and their <S%H3206>children<s%> in <S%H7223>front,<s%> <S%H3812>Leah<s%> and her <S%H3206>children<s%> <S%H314>after,<s%> and <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> at the <S%H314>rear.<s%>

He himself passed <S%H5674>over<s%> in front of <S%H6440>them,<s%> and bowed <S%H7812>himself<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> until he came <S%H5066>near<s%> to his <S%H251>brother.<s%>
<S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> to meet <S%H7125>him,<s%> <S%H2263>embraced<s%> <S%H5307>him,<s%> fell on his <S%H6677>neck,<s%> kissed <S%H5401>him,<s%> and they <S%H1058>wept.<s%>

He lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> and the <S%H3206>children;<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Who are <S%H428>these<s%> with <S%H559>you?<s%>" He said, "The <S%H3206>children<s%> whom <S%H430>God<s%> has graciously <S%H2603>given<s%> your <S%H5650>servant.<s%>"
Then the <S%H8198>handmaids<s%> came <S%H5066>near<s%> with their <S%H3206>children,<s%> and they bowed <S%H7812>themselves.<s%>

<S%H3812>Leah<s%> also and her <S%H3206>children<s%> came <S%H5066>near,<s%> and bowed <S%H7812>themselves.<s%> <S%H310>After<s%> <S%H3130>them,<s%> Joseph <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> with <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> and they bowed <S%H7812>themselves.<s%>

Esau <S%H559>said,<s%> "What do you mean by all this <S%H4264>company<s%> which I <S%H6298>met?<s%>" Jacob <S%H559>said,<s%> "To <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of my <S%H113>lord.<s%>"
<S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H7227>enough,<s%> my <S%H251>brother;<s%> let that which you have be yours."

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4672>"Please,<s%> no, if I have now found <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> then <S%H3947>receive<s%> my <S%H4503>present<s%> at my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> because I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> your <S%H6440>face,<s%> as one <S%H7200>sees<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and you were pleased with <S%H7521>me.<s%>

Please <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H1293>gift<s%> that I <S%H935>brought<s%> to <S%H430>you,<s%> because God has dealt graciously with <S%H2603>me,<s%> and <S%H3605>because<s%> I <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H3605>enough.<s%>" He <S%H6484>urged<s%> <S%H3947>him,<s%> and he took it.
Esau <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let us take our <S%H5265>journey,<s%> and let us <S%H3212>go,<s%> and I will go before <S%H3212>you.<s%>"

Jacob <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H113>him,<s%> "My lord <S%H3045>knows<s%> that the <S%H3206>children<s%> are <S%H7390>tender,<s%> and that the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and <S%H1241>herds<s%> with me have their <S%H5763>young,<s%> and if they <S%H1849>overdrive<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> all the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> will <S%H4191>die.<s%>

Please let my <S%H113>lord<s%> pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and I will lead <S%H5095>on<s%> <S%H328>gently,<s%> according <S%H7272>to<s%> the pace of the <S%H4399>livestock<s%> that are before <S%H6440>me<s%> and according to the <S%H7272>pace<s%> of the <S%H3206>children,<s%> until I <S%H935>come<s%> to my <S%H113>lord<s%> to <S%H8165>Seir.<s%>"

<S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let me now <S%H3322>leave<s%> with you some of the <S%H5971>folk<s%> who are with <S%H559>me.<s%>" He said, <S%H4100>"Why?<s%> Let me <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of my <S%H113>lord.<s%>"
So <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> on his <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H8165>Seir.<s%>

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5265>traveled<s%> to <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> himself a <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5521>shelters<s%> for his <S%H4735>livestock.<s%> Therefore the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5523>Succoth.<s%>

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in <S%H8004>peace<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> which is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> when he <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H6307>Paddan<s%> <S%H2583>Aram;<s%> and encamped <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

He <S%H7069>bought<s%> the <S%H2513>parcel<s%> of <S%H7704>ground<s%> where he had <S%H5186>spread<s%> his <S%H168>tent,<s%> at the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2544>Hamor,<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>'s <S%H1>father,<s%> for one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> pieces of <S%H7192>money.<s%>
He <S%H5324>erected<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H7121>there,<s%> and called it El Elohe <S%H415>Israel.<s%>
